revision.text:
{{codepointer|Doom|Missile movement}} {{doomwiki|A_FireCrackle}} '''A_FireCrackle'''
(no parameters)
Plays the sound "vile/firecrkl" and calls [[A_Fire]].
== Examples ==
This example is taken from Doom's {{Class|ArchvileFire|Archvile Fire}}
Spawn: FIRE A 2 bright [[A_StartFire]] FIRE BAB 2 bright [[A_Fire]] FIRE C 2 bright [[A_FireCrackle]] FIRE BCBCDCDCDEDED 2 bright [[A_Fire]] FIRE E 2 bright [[A_FireCrackle]] FIRE FEFEFGHGHGH 2 bright [[A_Fire]] Stop
